page.title: 03Witherley Church Choir
page.content: Julie, Michala, Dawn, Lisa, Kerry, Faye, and two Samanthas are all in Witherley Church Choir. Samantha, Julie, Michala have all been confirmed, so they wear black robes. Dawn, Faye, Lisa, Kerry and Samantha are all "red robes" because we have not been confirmed, but Kerry has just been confirmed and is going up to "black robe" soon. We have got a new choir-mistress called Mrs Durant and she is very kind. Mrs Durant plays the organ for the choir practice and we have a great time. We sometimes sing some of the things that we have sung in school before. Last Sunday we had a service. We sit in the pews to sing and practise. When we've finished we say a prayer.We also have services on Sunday mornings too.Then Julie,Michala and Samantha take the bread and wine.
